title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Built with modern technologies for optimal performance.

title: AI Chat Application
description: Real-time chat application powered by AI with smart replies, sentiment analysis, and multi-language support. Features WebSocket for instant messaging.

title: Task Management Dashboard
description: Collaborative task management tool with drag-and-drop interface, team collaboration features, and analytics. Perfect for agile teams.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: Beautiful weather application with 7-day forecasts, interactive maps, and location-based alerts. Responsive design for all devices.

title: Portfolio CMS
description: Content management system specifically designed for developers and designers to showcase their work. Easy to customize and deploy.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Mobile-first fitness tracking application with workout plans, progress tracking, and social features. Integrates with popular fitness APIs.

title: Code Snippet Manager
description: Developer tool for organizing and sharing code snippets with syntax highlighting, tagging system, and team collaboration features.

title: Music Streaming Platform
description: Spotify-like music streaming service with playlist creation, recommendations, and social sharing. Built with scalability in mind.
